segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is wasting water all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor looks filthy already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is splashing in it without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's handling dirty dishes while ignoring the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are filthy thieves, raiding the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is grimy and about to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand is outstretched, greedy for sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets spilling out treats like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole room smells of dampness, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden outside can't hide this sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so careless and gross.
segments.speaker: PAR
